CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK( Internal_Status__c ), CASE( Type__c,
'Sales Receipt', 'Paid', 'Refund Receipt', 'Paid',
'Invoice', IF( Amount_Overdue__c > 0, 'Overdue', IF( Amount_Due__c > 0, IF( Amount_Received__c > 0, 'Partial', 'Open' ), 'Paid' ) ),
IF( Credit_Memo_Unallocated_Credit__c > 0, 'Unapplied', 'Closed' ) ), Internal_Status__c )
CustomField.label: Status
